#summary Listing of all controller request functions.
#labels chapter,1.0

These functions are called from actions in your controller files.

==Example==

`controllers/Blog.cfc`:

{{{
<cffunction name="sendSomewhere">
  <cfset redirectTo(action="somewhere")>
</cffunction>
}}}

==Functions==

*Miscellaneous:*
 * [isAjax isAjax()]
 * [isGet isGet()]
 * [isPost isPost()]
 * [redirectTo redirectTo()]
 * [sendEmail sendEmail()]

*Rendering:*
 * [sendFile sendFile()]
